tool_description: Contains more than 45,000 Cricket Matches Data .
title: Cricket Analytics

api_list.name: continent from id
api_list.description: Get one continent using continent id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-analytics2.p.rapidapi.com/continent/{continent_id}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-analytics2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

search player
api_list.description: Allows you to search for a player in relation  Player {name}.  3 characters are enough to search.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-analytics2.p.rapidapi.com/player/{word}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-analytics2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
